com.metreeca.rest.wrappers

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.wrappers.Connector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wrapper

    public final class Connector
extends Object
implements Wrapper
    Graph connection manager.

    Executes wrapped handlers inside a shared connection to the the system graph database.

    If the request is not safe, wrapped handlers are executed inside a single transaction on the shared connection, which is automatically committed on successful response or rolled back otherwise.

      • connect

        public static <R> Supplier<R> connect(Function<RepositoryConnection,R> supplier)
        Connects a graph-based supplier.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the value generated by supplier
        Parameters:
        supplier - the graph-based supplier
        Returns:
        a plain supplier that creates a read-only on demand connection to the to shared system Graph and delegates value generation to the connected graph-based supplier
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supplier is null

      • connect

        public static <V,R> Function<V,R> connect(BiFunction<RepositoryConnection,V,R> function)
        Connects a graph-based function.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the argument accepted by function
        R - the type of the value returned by function
        Parameters:
        function - the graph-based function
        Returns:
        a plain function that creates a read-only on demand connection to the to shared system Graph and delegates processing to the connected graph-based function
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null

      • query

        @SafeVarargs
public static <M extends Message<M>> BiFunction<M,Model,Model> query(String query,
                                                                                  BiConsumer<M,GraphQuery>... customizers)
        Creates a SPARQL query message filter.
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of the target message for the new filter
        Parameters:
        query - the SPARQL graph query (describe/construct) to be executed by the new filter on target messages; empty scripts are ignored
        customizers - optional custom configuration setters for the SPARQL query operation
        Returns:
        a message filter executing the SPARQL graph query on target messages with standard bindings and optional custom configurations; returns the input model extended with the statements returned by query
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null or if customizers contains null values

      • update

        @SafeVarargs
public static <M extends Message<M>> BiFunction<M,Model,Model> update(String update,
                                                                                   BiConsumer<M,Update>... customizers)
        Creates a SPARQL update housekeeping filter.
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of the target message for the new filter
        Parameters:
        update - the SPARQL update script to be executed by the new housekeeping filter on target messages; empty scripts are ignored
        customizers - optional custom configuration setters for the SPARQL update operation
        Returns:
        a housekeeping filter executing the SPARQL update script on target messages with standard bindings and optional custom configurations; returns the input model without altering it
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null or if customizers contains null values

      • configure

        @SafeVarargs
public static <M extends Message<M>,O extends Operation> O configure(M message,
                                                                                  O operation,
                                                                                  BiConsumer<M,O>... customizers)
        Configures standard bindings for SPARQL message filters.

        Configures the following pre-defined bindings for the target SPARQL operation:

        variable value
        ?time an xsd:dateTime literal representing the execution system time with millisecond precision
        ?this the focus item of the filtered message
        ?stem the namespace of the IRI bound to the this variable
        ?name the local name of the IRI bound to the this variable
        ?task the HTTP method of the original request
        ?base the base IRI of the original request
        ?item the focus item of the original request
        ?user the IRI identifying the user submitting the original request

        If the target message is a response, the following additional bindings are configured:

        variable value
        ?code the HTTP status code of the filtered response
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type f the message to be filtered
        O - the type of the SPARQL operation to be configured
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be filtered
        operation - the SPARQL operation executed by the filter
        customizers - optional custom configuration setters for the SPARQL operation
        Returns:
        the input operation with standard bindings and optional custom configurations applied
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null or if customizers contains null values

      • wrap

        public Handler wrap(Handler handler)
        Description copied from interface: Wrapper
        Wraps a handler.
        Specified by:
        wrap in interface Wrapper
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
